name: rustbot
description: A lightweight Rust server management bot

scripts.install: cd backend && npm install --no-audit --no-fund --no-optional --no-package-lock && cd ../frontend && npm install --no-audit --no-fund --no-optional --no-package-lock
scripts.dev:frontend: cd frontend && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=128' npm run dev
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=128' npm run dev

author: Your Name
